author: Ross Tomita
title: Problem logging into edx
question:
I've been successfully able to use Edx on my computer, however I do like the option of being able to view the practice videos on another computer (using the ones at IKB). My problem is that I can't login to my edx account, as I get the error that my username or password is incorrect. I have tried:

- At least 10 times to make sure the password and username exactly match
- Been successfully able to login on my personal computer
- Logged out of edx on my computer before logging into a library computer
- resetting my password

If anyone knows how I can resolve this access issue that would be greatly appreciated!

UPDATE: Solved (kind of): For some reason, the only way I am able to login on the library computers is by first logging into my gmail account, and then clicking on the link that lets me sign in as I would for a password reset. When I'm directed to that login screen I have no problems logging in. Since this works, I'd consider this issue solved, just a little puzzled by this strange pathway
student_answer: Have you tried using another browser?
